summary: This document is an email chain from January 2020 regarding the status of a subpoena for banking records from USAA for Ghislaine Maxwell. It indicates records were received and a copy was provided to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) prosecutors.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whose banking records are being requested from USAA as part of a criminal investigation.

events.title: USAA records request initiated
events.description: A request for banking records from USAA related to Ghislaine Maxwell is being prepared, as indicated by a notification from ClaimFox.

events.title: Records delivered to SDNY
events.description: A copy of the received USAA banking records for Ghislaine Maxwell was dropped off to the Southern District of New York prosecutors.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively subpoenaing Ghislaine Maxwell's banking records from USAA in late 2019/early 2020.
A third-party service, ClaimFox, was used to manage the request for records from USAA's criminal banking division.
The records were successfully obtained and delivered to SDNY prosecutors, indicating an ongoing financial investigation into Maxwell.
The email chain shows coordination within the prosecution team regarding the status of the subpoena.
